name: Path of Wild Magic
description: Barbarians who follow the Path of Wild Magic are suffused with unstable arcane power, unleashing unpredictable effects whenever they rage.

3.name: Magic Awareness
3.description: As an action, you can sense the presence of magic within 60 feet until the end of your next turn.

3.name: Wild Surge
3.description: When you enter a rage, roll on the Wild Magic Surge table to determine the magical effect produced.

6.name: Bolstering Magic
6.description: You can bolster yourself or an ally with magical energy.

options.name: Bolster Spellcasting
options.description: Restore a spell slot to a creature.

options.name: Bolster Attack
options.description: Add a bonus to an attack roll or ability check.

10.name: Unstable Backlash
10.description: When you take damage or fail a saving throw while raging, you can reroll on the Wild Magic Surge table and replace your current surge.

14.name: Controlled Surge
14.description: When you roll on the Wild Magic Surge table, you can roll twice and choose which result to use.
